## arrayUtils.sortValues() function

### arrayUtils.sortValues() function

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function sortValues(sort: SortOrder.Ascending | SortOrder.Descending): (a: any, b: any) => number;
```
<b>Import</b>

